statements: CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15), issue_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, order_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2))
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10,2))
CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE Ticket (ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, issue_description TEXT, status VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), order_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10, 2), category VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=InnoDB

CREATE TABLE payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), payment_date DATE, payment_method VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(order_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
    comment TEXT,
    review_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT, customer_name VARCHAR(50), customer_email VARCHAR(100), customer_phone VARCHAR(15);
CREATE TABLE tickets (ticket_id INT, customer_id INT, ticket_subject VARCHAR(100), ticket_description TEXT, ticket_status VARCHAR(20);
CREATE TABLE agents (agent_id INT, agent_name VARCHAR(50), agent_email VARCHAR(100), agent_phone VARCHAR(15);
